pageContext.claim: “I didn't give him a green light....Just the opposite of a green light.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump gave Turkish president Recep Tayyip Erdogan a green light by removing U.S. troops that had acted as a buffer against a Turkish invasion of northern Syria. In fact, Trump acknowledged in the same press availability: "Erdogan's decision didn't surprise me, because he's been wanting to do that for a long time."
